:orphan:



.. _sphx_glr_auto_examples:

Examples
========

PyRI can be used to import refractive index of a wide range of material and this
data can then be used for many things. Below is a gallery of examples showing
how to use the PyRI and what can be done with it.


.. raw:: html

    <div class="sphx-glr-clear"></div>



.. only:: html

 .. rst-class:: sphx-glr-signature

    `Gallery generated by Sphinx-Gallery <https://sphinx-gallery.github.io>`_
